hero.subtitle: Transforming ideas into scalable applications and viral content. Ethical, transparent, results-driven.

about.title: About
about.name: Mohamed
about.subtitle: A journey from computer engineering to digital media, driven by passion, ethics, and the pursuit of meaningful technology.
about.bio1: Syrian-born with Sudanese nationality, based in Istanbul. I'm a Computer Engineering graduate who evolved from technical work into digital media, now combining both worlds to create impactful web applications and content.
about.bio2: Co-founder of Qobouli with my wife—a free service helping Arab students navigate Turkish university applications. We bring diverse perspectives to every project, believing the best solutions emerge from collaboration.
about.bio3: I'm committed to ethical practices and complete transparency, delivering solutions with honest communication and regular updates that truly serve client needs.
about.globalPerspectiveDesc: Syria-born, Sudanese national, Istanbul-based. Bringing multicultural insights to every project.
about.careerEvolutionDesc: Computer Engineering graduate turned digital media specialist, combining technical skills with creative vision.
about.collaborativeDesc: Working in partnership with my wife, bringing diverse perspectives and shared values to every project.
about.coreValuesDesc: Ethical practices, transparency, and meaningful technology that creates positive impact.
about.ethicalFirstDesc: Every project is built on a foundation of honest communication, fair practices, and mutual respect.
about.globalMindsetDesc: Drawing from multicultural experiences to create solutions that work across different contexts and communities.
about.collaborativeSpiritDesc: Believing that the best solutions emerge from combining different perspectives and working together.

services.subtitle: From building web applications to creating viral content and helping students achieve their academic dreams - I offer comprehensive digital solutions.
services.fullstackDesc: Modern web applications built with React, Node.js, and cutting-edge technologies.
services.contentDesc: Engaging Instagram Reels and social media content that drives real engagement.
services.qobouliDesc: Comprehensive university application service for international students in Turkey.
services.transparencyDesc: I believe in ethical work practices and complete transparency. Every project includes regular updates, clear communication, and honest collaboration. I work closely with my wife on many projects, bringing diverse perspectives to every solution.

projects.title: Featured Work
projects.subtitle: A collection of projects showcasing modern development, ethical practices, and real impact.

content.subtitle: Creating engaging, educational, and entertaining content that resonates with millions across social media.

testimonials.title: Client Success
testimonials.subtitle: Real results from real clients who've experienced the impact of ethical, transparent, and high-quality digital solutions.
testimonials.metricClientSatDesc: All clients report being highly satisfied with delivered projects
testimonials.metricDeliveryDesc: Projects delivered on or before the agreed deadline
testimonials.metricPerformanceDesc: Average improvement in site speed after optimization
testimonials.metricReachDesc: Combined reach across all content creation projects
testimonials.metricPlacementsDesc: International students successfully placed in Turkish universities
testimonials.metricRepeatDesc: Clients who return for additional projects or services
testimonials.ctaTitle: Ready to Join These Success Stories?
testimonials.ctaDesc: Whether you need a lightning-fast web application, viral content that converts, or help navigating university applications in Turkey, let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.
testimonials.testimonial1Content: Mohamed transformed our MVP from a basic prototype into a polished, lightning-fast web application. His attention to performance optimization increased our user engagement by 40%.
testimonials.testimonial2Content: Working with Mohamed on our content strategy was game-changing. His Instagram reels not only went viral but actually converted into quality leads for our business.
testimonials.testimonial3Content: Thanks to Qobouli and Mohamed's guidance, I found the perfect university program in Turkey that matched my budget and career goals. The application process was smooth and transparent.
testimonials.testimonial4Content: The e-commerce platform Mohamed built for us handles 10K+ orders monthly without any hiccups. His code quality and documentation made future updates seamless.

qobouli.subtitle: Ethical, transparent student registration services helping Arab students achieve their academic dreams in Turkey.
